info.summary:
Balaji Padmanabhan works as a Professor in Information Systems & Decision Sciences Muma College of Business, University of South Florida, and his\her h-index is 20, g-index is 42. His\Her interests are :
 Data Mining; Unexpected Pattern; Association Rule; Gan Hemt; Domain Knowledge;
